name: HKWorkoutEventType
desc: Constants that represent events occurring during a workout.

items.name: case pause
items.desc: A constant indicating that the workout has paused.

items.name: case resume
items.desc: A constant indicating that the workout has resumed.

items.name: case motionPaused
items.desc: A constant indicating that the system has automatically paused a workout session.

items.name: case motionResumed
items.desc: A constant indicating that the system has automatically resumed a workout session.

items.name: case pauseOrResumeRequest
items.desc: A constant indicating that the user has requested a pause or resume.

items.name: case segment
items.desc: A constant indicating a period of time of interest during a workout.

items.name: case marker
items.desc: A constant indicating a point of interest during a workout session.
